short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin manages the social media for an organization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
i-Comply and Social Media Guard are our flagship social media compliance, prevention and archiving platforms that allow your organization to leverage social media in a low risk compliant manner based on the social media  policies you set up for your organization.

You should first sign up for i-Comply here - http://isocialsmart.com/trial-2/ before loading this plugin.

Once loaded the plugin will automatically send posts from FaceBook, LinkedIn and Twitter through i-Comply for approval and archiving.
